name: Color Domination
description:
In a world where color disbanded, there is one person who can save the world. Blank, an accumulation of all that came before, inheriting RED GREEN & BLUE. It is up to you, the player, to assemble the artifacts and rebuild peace among the colors.

This game is a simple 2-D platformer that takes advantage of artificial intelligence and aspects of our favorite games to create a parkour/puzzle game with several levels and difficulties. This game was made for a game development course at the Bronx High School of Science.

If you want to replay the game, use the level select feature and select level 1! The normal level start and tutorial reset your scores so they are meant for a new player entirely!

Many of the assets are borrowed from other sources and, as such, are not mine.
